title: Toy Story 3 (2010) 1080p iTunes
description:
Toy Story 3 (2010) 103 min

DESCRIPTION:
While Andy prepares to leave home for college, the toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home. (with two audio commentaries: the 1st with director Lee Unkrich and producer Darla K. Anderson; the 2nd with supervising animator Bobby Podesta, supervising technical director Guido Quaroni, production designer Bob Pauley, supervising animator Mike Venturini and story supervisor Jason Katz.)

SPECS IN BRIEF:
M4V file for iTunes/iDevices
V: 1920x1080 23.98 fps h.264 @ 4130 Kbps
A: 160 Kbps 2.0 AAC & 384 Kbps 5.1 AC-3 / 96 Kbps 2.0 AAC (commentaries)
S: English & English SDH (Dialogue for "Spanish Buzz" burned-in)

SOURCE:
Retail Blu-ray Discs

PLAYBACK:
Encoded & tagged for iTunes and Apple devices that can handle *1080p HD* video. Playback is confirmed for:
  1. 2012 iPad
  2. 2012 AppleTV
  3. 2011 iPad 2 (with 5.1 software or later)
  4. 2011 iPhone 4S
  5. 2010 AppleTV (with 5.0 software; will output file as 720p)
  6. 2010 iPad 1 (with 5.1 software or later) (Mixed reports)
